t:
I was very happy when Amazon finally delivered the new laptop my dad got for me.


“Why did you tell him where we live?” my mom screamed in fear when I told her.
c:
Little did I know that my mom had been using me for money, and now she was afraid that my dad would take me away.



Background image made with Dall-E.

#laptop #fear #privacy #family #hidden #happiness #surprise #address
